Package kozlov.kirill.sockets.server

Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
kozlov.kirill.sockets.server.TaskManager
public class TaskManager extends Object
Class for communication manager with workers.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskManager

      public TaskManager(TaskData taskData, int workersPerTask, int multicastServerPort, int managerPort)
      TaskManager constructor.
      Parameters:
      taskData - data for processing
      workersPerTask - count of workers need to process task
      multicastServerPort - port for founding workers
      managerPort - client's socket port from ClientManager

  • Method Details

    • processTask

      public Optional<TaskResult> processTask() throws WorkerNotFoundException, InternalWorkerErrorException
      Task processor.
      Returns:
      result of concurrent calculation in found workers. There are no ways to get Optional.empty() because any error will produce exceptions described below
      Throws:
      WorkerNotFoundException - thrown in case when there are not enough free workers for calculation
      InternalWorkerErrorException - thrown in case when some error occurred in worker and after that there are not enough free workers for calculation
